entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:41 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -40.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 03:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -40.7°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -44.6°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 33. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
